string.text:
The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal for SOCOM to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. This family of rifle consist of two types, the SCAR-H and SCAR-L. The SCAR-H (Heavy) is chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: NATO suppressor
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Grenade Launcher: FN HERSTAL FN40GL Mk2

The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal for SOCOM to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. This family of rifle consist of two types, the SCAR-H and SCAR-L. The SCAR-H (Heavy) is chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge.
 This rifle has been customized for better handling, but that voids the use of a grenade launcher.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Installed Upgrades: Tactical Magpull foregrip, Tritium Sights
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount).n %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: NATO suppressor

The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal for SOCOM to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. This family of rifle consist of two types, the SCAR-H and SCAR-L. The SCAR-H (Heavy) is chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge.
 This rifle has been customized for improved performance in CQB, but that voids the use of a grenade launcher.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Installed Upgrades: Tactical Magpull foregrip, Tritium Sights, B.E. MEYERS MAWL-C1 tactical green laser aim module
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes: All for picatinny/weaver (except of Red Dot Sights with low mount: Trijicon RMR, Leupold DeltaPoint PRO, Aimpoint T1 (low mount), Docter Sight, 1P76 Rakurs (low mount)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: NATO suppressor

The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a modular rifle made by FN Herstal for SOCOM to satisfy the requirements of the SCAR competition. This family of rifle consist of two types, the SCAR-H and SCAR-L. The SCAR-H (Heavy) is chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO cartridge.
 This rifle has been customized for improved performance at longer ranges, but that voids the use of a grenade launcher.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Installed Upgrades: B.E. MEYERS MAWL-C1 tactical green laser aim module
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes installed: Vortex RAZOR UH-1 è EOTech G33.STS magnifier
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Suppressor: NATO suppressor

%c[ui_gray_1]40mm grenade launcher developed by the Belgian company FN Herstal for the FN SCAR assault rifle
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] FN SCAR
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] ammunition: %c[ui_gray_1]M203 40mm grenade
